lead_paragraph: Cleary Gottlieb Steen & Hamilton called itself an "international law firm" long before it became trendy to do so. The firm, which is based in New York, underscored its global reach on Monday when it named four new partners and four new counsel from all over the map.
snippet: The New York-based law firm Cleary Gottlieb Steen & Hamilton showed its international focus on Monday when it named four new partners.
abstract: The New York-based law firm Cleary Gottlieb Steen & Hamilton showed its international focus on Monday when it named four new partners.
